epd_metadata.declaration_owner: Holcim México Operaciones S.A. de C.V.
epd_metadata.third_party_verifier: Geoffrey Guest, Certified 3rd Party Verifier under the International EPD Program

product_description.manufacturing_location: Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo, México
product_description.product_scope: 34 concrete mixes manufactured at the Holcim Mexico Operaciones S.A. de C.V. Playa del Carmen concrete facility

lca_information.study_goal: To comply with the procedures for creating a Type III environmental product declaration (EPD) and publish the EPD for public review.
lca_information.excluded_stages: Transportation to the construction site, on-site construction processes, building use and maintenance, and end-of-life effects.
lca_information.data_sources: ecoinvent V3.8 database, Holcim primary data for 2022
lca_information.cut_off_criteria: Minimum of 95% of the total inflows (mass and energy) included

transport_and_installation.product_transport_requirements: Diesel fuel used by the mixing trucks is direct primary information reported from Holcim México records for the year 2022.

recycled_materials_handling.recycled_reused_materials: The amount of returned concrete is based on Holcim primary data for the reference year, 2022.

additional_info.company_description: Holcim Mexico produces and markets cement, ready-mix concrete, and other products and services for construction.
additional_info.sustainability_initiatives: Holcim continues to invest in research and development, focusing on sustainable solutions such as urban mining solutions, waste treatment services, and low CO2 building materials.
